verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> happened אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And it came to pass after this כֵ֔ן <WH3651> after that וַיָּ֕מָת <WH4191> died מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned חָנ֥וּן <WH2586> and Hanun בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> David אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> I will shew חֶ֣סֶד ׀ <WH2617> kindness עִם־ <WH5973> with חָנ֣וּן <WH2586> unto Hanun בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נָחָ֗שׁ <WH5176> of Nahash כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֨ה <WH6213> shewed אָבִ֤יו <WH1> as his father עִמָּדִי֙ <WH5978> against חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> kindness וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sent דָּוִ֧ד <WH1732> unto me And David לְנַחֲמ֛וֹ <WH5162> to comfort בְּיַד־ <WH3027> him by the hand עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> of his servants אֶל־ <WH413> concerning אָבִ֑יו <WH1> for his father וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> came עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> servants דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David's אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> into the land בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <WH559> said שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> And the princes בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֜וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon אֶל־ <WH413> to חָנ֣וּן <WH2586> unto Hanun אֲדֹֽנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH113> their lord הַֽמְכַבֵּ֨ד <WH3513> doth honour דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> thou that David אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> thy father בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> Thinkest כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> that he hath sent לְךָ֖ מְנַֽחֲמִ֑ים <WH5162> comforters הֲ֠לוֹא <WH3808> not בַּעֲב֞וּר <WH5668> unto thee to חֲק֤וֹר <WH2713> search אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> the city וּלְרַגְּלָ֣הּ <WH7270> and to spy it out וּלְהָפְכָ֔הּ <WH2015> and to overthrow שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> [rather] sent דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> unto thee? hath not David אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> his servants אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took חָנ֜וּן <WH2586> Wherefore Hanun אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> servants דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> David's וַיְגַלַּח֙ <WH1548> and shaved off אֶת־ <WH853> חֲצִ֣י <WH2677> the one half זְקָנָ֔ם <WH2206> of their beards וַיִּכְרֹ֧ת <WH3772> and cut off אֶת־ <WH853> מַדְוֵיהֶ֛ם <WH4063> their garments בַּחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> in the middle עַ֣ד <WH5704> far שְׁתֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8357> [even] to their buttocks וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵֽם׃ <WH7971> and sent them away

וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <WH5046> When they told לְדָוִד֙ <WH1732> [it] unto David וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> he sent לִקְרָאתָ֔ם <WH7125> to meet כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> them because the men נִכְלָמִ֣ים <WH3637> ashamed מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> were greatly וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> and the king שְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> Tarry בִֽירֵח֔וֹ <WH3405> at Jericho עַד־ <WH5704> until יְצַמַּ֥ח <WH6779> be grown זְקַנְכֶ֖ם <WH2206> until your beards וְשַׁבְתֶּֽם׃ <WH7725> and [then] return

וַיִּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> saw בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And when the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִבְאֲשׁ֖וּ <WH887> that they stank בְּדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> before David וַיִּשְׁלְח֣וּ <WH7971> sent בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children עַמּ֡וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַיִּשְׂכְּרוּ֩ <WH7936> and hired אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרַ֨ם <WH758> the Syrians בֵּית־ רְח֜וֹב <WH1050> of Bethrehob וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲרַ֣ם <WH758> and the Syrians צוֹבָ֗א <WH6678> of Zoba עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand רַגְלִ֔י <WH7273> footmen וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> and of king מַֽעֲכָה֙ <WH4601> Maacah אֶ֣לֶף <WH505> a thousand אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> men ט֔וֹב <WH2897> Tob שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten אֶ֖לֶף <WH376> men אִֽישׁ׃ <WH505> thousand

וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> heard דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> And when David וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> of [it] he sent אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> Joab וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַצָּבָ֖א <WH6635> and all the host הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <WH1368> of the mighty men

וַיֵּֽצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> came out בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַיַּעַרְכ֥וּ <WH6186> in array מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> and put the battle פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> at the entering in הַשָּׁ֑עַר <WH8179> of the gate וַאֲרַ֨ם <WH758> and the Syrians צוֹבָ֤א <WH6678> of Zoba וּרְחוֹב֙ <WH7340> and of Rehob וְאִֽישׁ־ <WH376> he ט֣וֹב <WH2897> Tob וּמַֽעֲכָ֔ה <WH4601> and Maacah לְבַדָּ֖ם <WH905> [were] by themselves בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> in the field

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> When Joab כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> was set אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> against פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> that the front הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> of the battle מִפָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> was against him before וּמֵֽאָח֑וֹר <WH268> and behind וַיִּבְחַ֗ר <WH977> he chose מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all בְּחוּרֵ֣י <WH970> young [בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל כ] (יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel ק) וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֖ךְ <WH6186> and put [them] in array לִקְרַ֥את <WH7125> against אֲרָֽם׃ <WH758> the Syrians

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> And the rest הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people נָתַ֕ן <WH5414> he delivered בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> into the hand אַבְשַׁ֣י <WH52> of Abishai אָחִ֑יו <WH251> his brother וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֕ךְ <WH6186> that he might put [them] in array לִקְרַ֖את <WH7125> against בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said אִם־ <WH518> If תֶּחֱזַ֤ק <WH2388> be too strong אֲרָם֙ <WH758> If the Syrians מִמֶּ֔נִּי <WH4480> are too וְהָיִ֥תָה <WH1961> become לִּ֖י לִֽישׁוּעָ֑ה <WH3467> and help וְאִם־ <WH518> if בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> me but if the children עַמּוֹן֙ <WH5983> of Ammon יֶחֱזְק֣וּ <WH2388> be too strong מִמְּךָ֔ <WH4480> are too וְהָלַכְתִּ֖י <WH1980> for thee then I will come לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַֽ <WH3467> to help לָֽךְ׃

חֲזַ֤ק <WH2388> Be of good courage וְנִתְחַזַּק֙ <WH2388> and let us play the men בְּעַד־ <WH1157> the sake עַמֵּ֔נוּ <WH5971> for our people וּבְעַ֖ד <WH1157> the sake עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> and for the cities אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> of our God וַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and the LORD יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> do הַטּ֖וֹב <WH2896> him good בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> that which seemeth

וַיִּגַּ֣שׁ <WH5066> drew nigh יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> And Joab וְהָעָם֙ <WH5971> and the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> that [were] with him unto the battle בַּֽאֲרָ֑ם <WH758> against the Syrians וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <WH5127> and they fled מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וּבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> And when the children עַמּ֤וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon רָאוּ֙ <WH7200> saw כִּי־ <WH3588> for נָ֣ס <WH5127> were fled אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> that the Syrians וַיָּנֻ֙סוּ֙ <WH5127> then fled מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> they also before אֲבִישַׁ֔י <WH52> Abishai וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and entered הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> into the city וַיָּ֣שָׁב <WH7725> returned יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> So Joab מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> from against בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> from the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> And when the Syrians כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִגַּ֖ף <WH5062> that they were smitten לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וַיֵּאָסְפ֖וּ <WH622> they gathered יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> themselves together

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent הֲדַדְעֶ֗זֶר <WH1909> and Hadadezer וַיֹּצֵ֤א <WH3318> and brought out אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרָם֙ <WH758> the Syrians אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who מֵעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> that [were] beyond הַנָּהָ֔ר <WH5104> the river וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and they came חֵילָ֑ם <WH2431> to Helam וְשׁוֹבַ֛ךְ <WH7731> and Shobach שַׂר־ <WH8269> the captain צְבָ֥א <WH6635> of the host הֲדַדְעֶ֖זֶר <WH1909> of Hadadezer לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> [went] before

וַיֻּגַּ֣ד <WH5046> And when it was told לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> David ס וַיֶּאֱסֹ֤ף <WH622> together אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> all Israel וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> and passed over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came חֵלָ֑אמָה <WH2431> to Helam וַיַּעַרְכ֤וּ <WH6186> set themselves in array אֲרָם֙ <WH758> And the Syrians לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> against דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David וַיִּלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> and fought עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> against

וַיָּ֣נָס <WH5127> fled אֲרָם֮ <WH758> And the Syrians מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> Israel וַיַּהֲרֹ֨ג <WH2026> slew דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> and David מֵאֲרָ֗ם <WH758> of the Syrians שְׁבַ֤ע <WH7651> [the men of] seven מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred רֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> chariots וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> and forty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand פָּרָשִׁ֑ים <WH6571> horsemen וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> שׁוֹבַ֧ךְ <WH7731> Shobach שַׂר־ <WH8269> the captain צְבָא֛וֹ <WH6635> of their host הִכָּ֖ה <WH5221> and smote וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> who died שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיִּרְא֨וּ <WH7200> saw כָֽל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּלָכִ֜ים <WH4428> And when all the kings עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> [that were] servants הֲדַדְעֶ֗זֶר <WH1909> of Hadadezer כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נִגְּפוּ֙ <WH5062> that they were smitten לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וַיַּשְׁלִ֥מוּ <WH7999> they made peace אֶת־ <WH854> with יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> with Israel וַיַּֽעַבְד֑וּם <WH5647> and served וַיִּֽרְא֣וּ <WH3372> feared אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> them So the Syrians לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> to help ע֖וֹד <WH5750> anymore אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon פ
